text: @NYGovCuomo We need NA/AA meets open, I just lost three friends to drugs isn’t the past three days. A Swedish model, if your under 50, you may require protective equipment, and mandate 3 foot distance and masks/gloves, it’s tragic if anyone dies absolutely, but for three YOUNG peop #COVID19
